title: Private balcony or patio, Controlled-entry access, Onsite playground
neighborhood: 285 E Del Amo Blvd, Carson, CA
posting_body: ['Evolve South Bay is a place where we collaborate with our residents to redefine apartment living.', 'Our vibrant community, located in the heart of Carson, offers an exciting and engaging lifestyle with refined amenities in our new development apartment homes.', 'Each one of our pet friendly apartment homes come fully equipped with energy-efficient stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, private balconies, in-home washer and dryer, and much more.', '-2-inch faux wood blinds', '-Polished quartz kitchen countertops', '-Controlled-entry access', '-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages', '-Oversized walk-in closets', '-Ceiling fans in living areas', '-Wood-style plank flooring Featured amenity', '-State-of-the-art fitness center with running track and yoga room Featured amenity', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station', '-Easy access to the 110, 405 and 710 freeways', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with cabanas Photo Featured amenity', '-Attached garages available select units', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
